content: @JP the sandbox is currently not available since few days, please, can you tell me if you are planning to put it on line again and when ?

They've been migrated to new hosting infrastructure and the urls have changed:

https://cloud.alphora.com/sandbox/r4/cqm/
The cqf-ruler readme has the new urls, but we should probably make that more prominent.
Abdelali Boussadi has marked this topic as resolved.
